description_top: Collection of Yiddish and Hebrew texts
catalogue_description: Hebrew and Judaica Manuscripts at the Bodleian Libraries, Oxford University
title: Collection of Yiddish and Hebrew texts
author: Molin, Yaacov
description: Contents: Yaacov Molin, Customs (minhagim) (ff. 1r-90r). Mitsṿot nashim (ff. 91r-109r). Meir ben Isaac Sheliʼaḥ Ẓibbur, Aḳdamut milin (ff. 110r-116r). Yiddish translation of the Five Scrolls (ff. 116v-181v). Yiddish translation of piyyutim and seliḥot for Yamim Noraim (ff. 182r-202r). Elijah Levita, ha-Mavdil ben ḳodesh le-ḥol (ff. 203r-207r). Poems (ff. 207v-213v). Riddles (ff. 214r-215r). Yiddish translation of Pirḳe Avot (ff. 216r-241r). Tales (ff. 241v-258r). Poems (ff. 258r-266v). Maʾaśeh ben Sabar (ff. 266v-269r). Yiddish translation of 72 biblical verses (ff. 269v-274r).
